name: HEALTHY NAIL?
title: HEALTHY NAIL?
concern: A healthy nail is firm yet flexible, and can absorb normal shocks without splitting or chipping. Its surface is smooth with a subtle sheen and doesn't peel or flake at the tip.
solution: Even normal nails need protection.Mavala 002 double-action base coatprotects the nail plate and lengthens the life of a manicure.Mavala Colorfixapplied after the colour has dried adds further protection and makes a manicure last even longer.

name: DRY NAIL?
title: DRY NAIL?
concern: A dry nail breaks and flakes. This type of nail has to be nourished and reinforced. The problem is frequently due to insufficient nutrients in the diet, but can also be caused by contact with harsh substances such as detergents.
solution: With this type of nails, you should always wear the protective base coat,Barrier-Base. UseMavala Extra-Mild Nail Polish Removerto remove nail enamel, as it is acetone-free, and will treat your nails with care.

name: SOFT NAIL?
title: SOFT NAIL?
concern: A soft nail bends and tears easily, and needs extra protection. The cause of this problem is often a lack of proper vitamins and minerals in the daily diet. It can also be caused by illness.
solution: Mavala Scientifiquepenetrating nail hardener applied to the tips of nails only, adds strength at the nails' most vulnerable point. When completely dry, proceed with your manicure.Mavala Nail Shield, a two-phase treatment comprised of a nylonized base coat and a sealer mechanically reinforces the entire nail. Nailactan, nourishing treatment cream, massaged into the nail base each night, stimulates the development of healthy nails. UseMavala Extra-Mild Nail Polish Removerto remove nail enamel, as it is acetone-free, and will treat your nails with care.

name: THIN NAIL?
title: THIN NAIL?
concern: A thin nail is subject to breaking and splitting, and should be reinforced. It is usually caused by dietary deficiencies of calcium, minerals and vitamins, but also can be brought on by illness.
solution: Mavala Scientifiquepenetrating nail hardener applied to the tips of nails only, adds strength at the nails' most vulnerable point.Mavala Nail Shield, a two-phase treatment comprised of a nylonized base coat and a sealer reinforces the entire nail. Nailactan, nourishing treatment cream, massaged into the nail base each night, provides suppleness and elasticity, and stimulates healthy and vigorous growth. UseMavala Extra-Mild Nail Polish Removerto remove nail enamel, as it is acetone-free, and will treat your nails with care.

name: DAMAGED, BRITTLE NAIL?
title: Damaged, brittle nail?
concern: The nail lackes sheen, elasticity and resistance to impact. It is frequently due to insufficient nutrients in the diet, but also can be caused by contact with harsh substances such as detergents.
solution: ApplyNailactan creamat night to counteract dryness and increase the nail elasticity and suppleness by providing all the necessary nourishing elements to the nail roots.Mavala Scientifiquepenetrating nail hardener brushed onto the tips of the nails, once a week, before a manicure, reinforces the nails, protecting it splitting and breaking. With these nails, you should always wear a moisturizing base coat such asBarrier-Base. It is also important to useExtra-Mild Polish Remover, as it is acetone-free, and will treat your nails with care.

name: LIGHTLY RIDGED NAIL?
title: lightly ridged nail?
concern: A ridged nail has surface irregularities, usually in the form of ridges which run the length of the nail from the matrix to the tip. This condition has been linked to various dermatological disorders as well as illness.
solution: Mavala's Buffer Kitis an effective solution for slightly ridged nails. The grey Buffer smoothes the surface, and the pink Buffer gives the nails a healthy sheen.Ridge Filler, a specific treatment product developed for more deeply ridged nails, evens out surface irregularities and prepares the nail for a manicure.

name: SPLITTING, BREAKING NAIL?
title: Splitting, breaking nail?
concern: Nails with fragile tips can easily split or break off. It is often due to dietary deficiencies or overexposure to water and strong cleaning substances.
solution: Mavala Scientifiquepenetrating nail hardener, applied to the tip of the nail only, bonds the three layers of the nail plate and makes the nail more resistant. Always apply the fortifying and protective base coatMAVA-STRONGfor additional protection before the application of nail polish. Nailactan nourishing treatment cream, massaged daily into the nail base, will give your nails suppleness and elasticity. UseMavala Extra-Mild Nail Polish Removerto remove nail enamel, as it is acetone-free, and will treat your nails with care.

name: BITTEN NAIL?
title: Bitten nail?
concern: Nail biting is an uncontrollable reflex, frequently originating in childhood and is a reflection of nervousness. It usually occurs during a particular situation such as waiting at a red light, talking on the phone, during a moment of reflexion, when looking for an answer, etc.
solution: Apply one or two coats ofMavala Nail ShieldPhase 1, a strengthener with nylon fibres which spread over the nail like a lattice to strengthen almost like a second nail. Day 2 - Add cuticle care to your programme It is now time to start withMavala Scientifique. Apply only to nail tips to harden and fortify the new nail (see instructions). Continue to manicure your nails as on Day 6.You can start wearing a lightnail enamelnow.

name: SLOW GROWING NAIL?
title: SLow growing nail?
concern: The nail takes longer to reach its mature length; therefore, any damage or irregularity is longer lasting. This condition can be hereditary or brought on by ill-health or improper diet.
solution: At the same time, we suggest you use theMavala Buffer Kitwhich stimulates and promotes blood circulation, further encouraging nail growth, while giving your nails a smooth and glossy aspect. Always useMavala Extra-Mild Nail Polish Remover, as it is acetone-free and will treat your nails with care.

name: LIGHTLY STAINED OR YELLOW NAIL?
title: lightly stained or yellow nail?
concern: Nails are generally yellow or stained due to tobacco or the application of nail polish directly onto the nail plate, without a protective base coat.
solution: We recommend that you use theMavala Buffer Kit. The grey Buffer (no more than once a month) smoothes and reduces staining, while the pink Buffer gives the nails a healthy sheen. Always applyMavala 002 base coatto provide a protective barrier between coloured pigments contained in nail polish and the nail itself. UseMavala Extra-Mild Nail Polish Removerto remove nail enamel, as it is acetone-free, and will treat your nails with care.

name: YELLOW, STAINED, DULL NAIL?
title: yellow, stained, dull nail?
concern: Yellow, stained, dull nails offer an unsightly aspect. Besides, this condition can affect the colour of your nail polish, turning it into a dirty beige, a yellow or a dull red, when applied. This phenomenon is generally due to tobacco or the application of nail polish directly onto the nail plate, without a base coat.
solution: Nailactan treatment cream, massaged in every night, over the root of the nails, will help promote the growth of healthy nails. We also recommend that you use theMavala Buffer Kit. The grey Buffer (no more than once a month) smoothes and reduces staining, while the pink Buffer gives the nails a healthy sheen.

name: OVERGROWN CUTICLES?
title: overgrown cuticles?
concern: Overgrown cuticles detract from the neat outline of the nail, and can split to form annoying hangnails. Excessive growth of the cuticle can be systematic, but it is more frequently caused by a lack of attention to regular moisturizing and removal of excess tissue.

name: THICK, INFLEXIBLE NAIL?
title: thick, inflexible nails?
concern: This condition occurs because the keratin has become impregnated with calcium or silicon. This type of nail is often associated with persons suffering from arteriosclerosis. Frequent hard manual labour can also produce excessive keratinization and thick nails.
solution: TheMavala Buffer Kitis an effective solution for this type of nail: the grey Buffer smoothes the surface and the pink Buffer gives the nail a healthy sheen. Twice a week, brushMava-flex moisturising serumonto the entire nail surface, after having removed any trace of nail polish, grease or oil withMavala Extra Mild Nail Polish Remover. Massage in with your thumb. Leave to penetrate overnight. We also recommend the same protection as for healthy nails: useMavala 002 double-action base coatto protect and prolong the life of your manicure, andMavala Colorfixover dry nail polish for additional protection against flaking of nail polish. To avoid adding further thickness to your manicure, useOil Seal Dryerto fast dry your manicure without adding another layer.

name: NAIL WITH LONGITUDINAL GROOVES?
title: nail with longitudinal grooves?
concern: Longitudinal grooves are parallel furrows running the length of the nail which, when they reach the free edge, can crack and give an irregular appearance. They frequently appear in older people and can be evidence of certain illnesses such as lichen planus, renal failure, etc.
solution: TheMavala Buffer Kitis an effective solution for this type of nail: the grey Buffer smoothes the surface and the pink Buffer gives the nail a healthy sheen.Ridge Filler, a specific treatment product developed for more deeply ridged nails, evens out surface irregularities and prepares the nail for manicure. Nailactan treatment cream, massaged in every night, over the root of the nails, will help promote the growth of healthy nails. In extreme cases or when the use of Mavala products does not give satisfactory results, we suggest consulting a dermatologist for a complete diagnosis and recommended treatment.

name: NAIL WITH TRANSVERSAL GROOVES?
title: nail with transversal grooves?
concern: This condition can be caused by severe infection which harms the matrix and shows up as a deep groove running across the nail, which grows out with time. In certain chronic conditions, such as eczema, "manicure trauma", etc. waves may appear, separated by expanses of normal nail.
solution: TheMavala Buffer Kitis an effective solution for traversal ridged nails: the grey Buffer smoothes the surface and the pink Buffer gives the nail a healthy sheen.Ridge Filler, a specific treatment product developed for more deeply ridged nails, evens out surface irregularities and prepares the nail for manicure. Nailactan treatment cream, massaged in every night, over the root of the nails, will help promote the growth of healthy nails. In extreme cases or when the use of Mavala products does not give satisfactory results, we suggest consulting a dermatologist for a complete diagnosis and recommended treatment.

name: NAIL WITH SPOTTED EROSION?
title: nail with spotted erosion?
concern: Spotted erosion consists in small depressions on the nail surface, varying in number, size and placement, and are frequently associated with skin disorders.
solution: TheMavala Buffer Kit is an effective solution for this type of nail: the grey Buffer smoothes the surface and the pink Buffer gives the nail a healthy sheen.Ridge Filler, a specific treatment product developed for more deeply ridged nails, evens out surface irregularities and prepares the nail for manicure. Nailactan treatment cream, massaged in every night, over the root of the nails, will help promote the growth of healthy nails. In extreme cases or when the use of Mavala products does not give satisfactory results, we suggest consulting a dermatologist for a complete diagnosis and recommended treatment.

name: WHITE OR WHITE SPOTTED NAIL?
title: white or white spotted nails?
concern: Leuconychia (from the Greek leukos=white) can be due to a blow to the nail plate, heredity factors, or over-zealous manicures. Internal causes can be linked to menstruation or severe illness.
solution: Mavala cosmetic products cannot solve leuchonychia itself. Only a dermatologist is able to diagnose a precise remedy and prescribe a treatment. However, you can still have a manicure. First use the protective base coat,Mavala 002 double-action, then two fine coats ofMini Color, and finish withColorfix, so that your nail polish lasts longer.

name: BLACK OR BROWN NAIL?
title: BROWN OR BLACK NAIL?
concern: This problem frequently results from professional hazards, i.e. hair-dressers, carpenters, bakers, and photographers who come in contact with damaging products such as potassium permanganate, silver nitrate, abusive cosmetics (nail enamel containing many pigments), hair dyes, tobacco, etc. It can also be caused by general illness, mycosis infections, etc.
solution: Avoid manipulating products that cause this colouring. However, if the nail colouring is caused by an illness, Mavala products do not have any solution. We suggest consulting a dermatologist for a complete diagnosis and recommended treatment. However, you can still have a manicure. First use the protective base coat,Mavala 002 double-action, then two fine coats ofMini Color(preferably a dark shade), and finish withColorfixso that your nail polish lasts longer.

name: NAIL FUNGUS?
title: NAIL FUNGUS?
concern: Nail fungus (onychomycosis) is a common fungal infection that affects the nail plate, causing discoloration, thickening, and brittleness. The nail may turn yellow, brown, or white, and can become crumbly or distorted over time. Fungal infections thrive in warm, moist environments and can spread from one nail to another. They are often contracted in public places like swimming pools, gyms, or through shared footwear. If left untreated, the infection can worsen and become painful.
solution: MAVA-MED is a powerful antifungal nail solution specifically formulated to tackle fungal nail infections effectively. Its unique "Instant Killer" complex stops fungi from spreading and aids in nail healing. Enriched with lavender and eucalyptus essential oils, lactic acid and urea, it creates an environment that deters fungal growth while nourishing the nail plate. Apply MAVA-MED twice daily to the affected nails after cleaning and drying them thoroughly. Continue treatment for several weeks until the infection clears and healthy nail growth is visible. For severe or persistent infections, we recommend consulting a dermatologist for a complete diagnosis.
